h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
content: This one is just to the right of the Cliff of Oblivion Keeper's Shrine (when you're facing it). You'll find the Altar in the water.

The content is as follows:
This one is just to the right of the Cliff of Oblivion Keeper's Shrine (when you're facing it). You'll find the Altar in the water.
